short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Download files with iGetter Download Manager.
short.es: Agrega comandos de menú contextuales de iGetter.
short.fr: Ajoute les commandes de menu contextuel iGetter.
short.ja: iGetter コンテクストメニュー機能を追加
short.pt_BR: Adiciona iGetter comandos do menu contextual.
short.zh_CN: 添加 iGetter 文字菜单指令。
short.zh_TW: 新增 iGetter 項目特色選單指令

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
iGetter extension enables integration with iGetter Download Manager application. This extension adds several contextual menu commands for hyperlinks as well as automatic downloading with iGetter download accelerator when you click on a download. To work properly it requires iGetter Download Manager for Windows available on www.igetter.net or Windows Store.

iGetter is a powerful, full featured download manager and accelerator. iGetter can greatly improve the speed of your downloads using segmented downloading.
long.bg: This extension adds iGetter contextual menu commands. To work properly it requires iGetter application for Windows available on www.igetter.net
long.de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,pl,pt_BR,ru,tr,zh_CN,z: This extension adds iGetter contextual menu commands. To work properly it requires iGetter application available on www.igetter.net
